refnamediv.refpurpose: Multiply and accumulate a-rate signals only.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Multiply and accumulate a-rate signals only.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: ares maca asig1 , asig2 [, asig3] [, asig4] [, asig5] [...]

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para:
maca multiplies and accumulates a-rate signals only. It is equivalent to:
ares = asig1*asig2 + asig3*asig4 + asig5*asig6 + ...

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the maca opcode. It uses the file maca.csd. It is written for *NIX systems, and will generate errors on Windows.
